title: Still looking for the last 105 Howe McCormick stamped T206s to make a complete set
author: Howe’s Hunter

posts.post_title: Still looking for the last 105 Howe McCormick stamped T206s to make a complete set
posts.post_content:
These are the 105 cards I’m short of for completing a set as Howe would have known it (minus the two big Polar Bear backs, as the family mercantile didn’t sell Polar Bear). Any card with a * after it I know exists. I’ve seen it or photocopies of it. All the others are yet to be seen in the last 21 years. If you have any of these, please let me know. If you want to sell, even better. Thanks.

Whitey Alperman*
